title: Errant Ephemeron
text: FlyingSuspend 4— (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay  and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
expansion: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra
